title: 99% Invisible-41- The Human-Human Interface
description: Paola Antonelli is the Senior Curator in the Department of Architecture and Design at the Museum of Modern Art. Her most recent blockbuster show, Talk to Me, explored the communication between people and objects: from chairs that talk to subway … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
